Name: Lutkins Special Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: I've tried many variations on the above formula and none that are special.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Lutkins Special Martini contains 177 calories
